src:
Cerkniško jezero je!
07 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Uredništvo

“Še pred nekaj dnevi je bilo Cerkniško polje, zdaj je jezero!” Tako so se v Notranjskem regijskem parku razveselili, ko je v 24 urah jezerska gladina na nekaterih delih narasla za en meter.



Foto: Notranski regijski park

CERKNICA > Za začetek novembra je to sicer izjemno malo vode, ugotavljajo v Parku. Bomo videli, kaj bo nepredvidljivemu presihajočemu jezeru prineslo dodatno deževje. V Notranjskem regijskem parku, kjer skupaj z občino Cerknica tik ob jezeru pravkar gradijo Informacijsko-turistični center, so prav zato veliko pozornost posvetili kar 1,4 metra visokim temeljem in s tem omogočili protipoplavno zaščito. Gradnjo bodo predvidoma končali spomladi.



Foto: Notranski regijski park



Foto: Notranski regijski park
text:
It's Cerknica Lake!
07 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Uredništvo

“It was Cerknica Field a few days ago, now it is a lake!” So they rejoiced in the Notranjska Regional Park, when in 24 hours the lake level increased by one meter in some parts.



Photo: Notran Regional Park

CERKNICA> This is an extremely low amount of water for the beginning of November, the Park notes. We will see what will bring extra rain to the unpredictable intermittent lake. In Notranjska Regional Park, where together with the municipality of Cerknica just near the lake are just building an Information and Tourism Center, great attention was paid to the 1.4 meters high foundations, thus providing flood protection. Construction is expected to be completed in the spring.



Photo: Notran Regional Park



Photo: Notran Regional Park
